src:
Meme-meme Lucu Usai PSSI Putuskan Pecat Simon McMenemy
06 Nov 2019, 15:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI akhirnya memutuskan untuk mengakhiri kerja sama dengan Simon McMenemy. Pengumuman pemecatan pelatih timnas Indonesia tersebut diumumkan PSSI secara resmi melalui media sosial, Rabu (6/11/2019) siang ini.
"PSSI secara resmi berpisah dengan Simon McMenemy. Simon akan menjalani laga terakhir kontra Malaysia pada 19 November mendatang di Kuala Lumpur," tulis keterangan Twitter PSSI.
Juru taktik asal Skotlandia itu didepak lantaran performa buruk skuat Garuda pada Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022, yaitu gagal mendulang kemenangan.
Namun, Simon McMenemy dipastikan masih memiliki satu pertandingan saat Timnas Indonesia menghadapi Malaysia pada laga lanjutan Grup G Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022. Laga ini akan berlangsung di Stadion Nasional Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Selasa (19/11/2019).
Lawatan ke markas Harimau Malaya itu dipastikan bakal menjadi laga perpisahan Simon McMenemy bersama Yanto Basna dan kawan-kawan.
Kabar resmi pemecatan Simon McMenemy langsung direspons oleh sederet pencinta sepak bola Tanah Air. Tak sedikit warganet mengaku bersyukur karena sangat menanti-nanti keluarnya Simon McMenemy.
Bahkan, kabar ini langsung menjadi trending topik di media sosial. Mulai dari komentar hingga meme juga bertebaran.
Berikut adalah meme-meme terkait respon warganet yang kepalang tanggung bahagia atas nasib Simon McMenemy di Timnas Indonesia.
text:
Funny Meme-meme After PSSI Decides to Dismiss Simon McMenemy
Nov 6 2019, 15:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI finally decided to end the collaboration with Simon McMenemy. The announcement of the dismissal of the Indonesian national team coach was announced by PSSI officially through social media, Wednesday (11/06/2019) this afternoon.
"PSSI officially parted ways with Simon McMenemy. Simon will undergo the last match against Malaysia on November 19 next in Kuala Lumpur," wrote Twitter's PSSI statement.
The Scottish tactician was kicked out because of the poor performance of the Garuda squad at the 2022 World Cup Qualifiers, which failed to gain victory.
However, Simon McMenemy is certain to still have one match when the Indonesian national team faces Malaysia in the next match of Group G World Cup Qualification 2022. This match will take place at the Bukit Jalil National Stadium, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Tuesday (11/19/2019).
The visit to the Malayan Tiger headquarters will certainly be a farewell match for Simon McMenemy with Yanto Basna and his friends.
The official news of the dismissal of Simon McMenemy was immediately responded to by a line of soccer lovers in the country. Not a few citizens said they were grateful because they looked forward to Simon McMenemy's release.
In fact, this news immediately became a trending topic on social media. Ranging from comments to memes also scattered.
The following are memes related to the citizens' responses which are abysmally happy with the fate of Simon McMenemy in the Indonesian national team.
